casebody.data:
2001-2907 (La. 10/14/02)

STATE of Louisiana v. Gary MATTHEWS. No. 2001-KO-2907. Supreme Court of Louisiana. Oct. 14, 2002.

In re Matthews, Gary;-Defendant; Applying for Writ of Certiorari and/or Review, Parish of Terrebonne, 32nd Judicial District Court Div. B, No. 303250; to the Court of Appeal, First Circuit, No. 2000-KA-2115.

Denied.

WEIMER, J., recused.
